resources.string: This device does not support Bluetooth.
Shake the device, to change player.

To play this game, you will need an opponent, with another bluetooth enabled Android device. You will need to pair up your devices manually before starting the game. When playing, keep updating your screen manually, by tapping on the photos. Whenever you get an answer to a question that you asked, you can exclude the photos that doesn\'t mach the answer. Once you have narrowed your options down, you can make a guess on a person, by long-pressing on a photo.
